definitions.definition: intense and selfish desire for something, especially wealth, power, or food.
examples: avarice, cupidity, acquisitiveness, covetousness, rapacity; Morematerialism, mercenariness; rarepleonexia; informalmoney-grubbing, affluenza "human greed"gluttony, hunger, voracity, insatiability; gourmandism, intemperance, overeating, self-indulgence; informalpiggishness "her mouth watered with greed"desire, appetite, hunger, thirst, craving, longing, lust, yearning, hankering; avidity, eagerness; informalyen, itch "their greed for power"Morematerialism, mercenariness; pleonexia; money-grubbing, affluenza human greedgluttony, hunger, voracity, insatiability; gourmandism, intemperance, overeating, self-indulgence; piggishness her mouth watered with greeddesire, appetite, hunger, thirst, craving, longing, lust, yearning, hankering; avidity, eagerness; yen, itch their greed for power
